summary: The diff implements a comprehensive institutional corporate website for Quindore Holdings LLC covering all major requirements: global theme, header, hero, about, operating structure, compliance/governance, contact, footer, structure page, governance page, privacy/terms/legal pages, and responsive design. The implementation is largely complete and aligned with the build request. A few minor concerns exist around the logo lockup asset usage (only the monogram is used, not the full wordmark lockup image), the section padding minimum (7rem ~112px, slightly under the 120px minimum specified), and the fade-in being implemented via JavaScript IntersectionObserver rather than pure CSS. No major hallucinated features were found beyond boilerplate auth infrastructure.

missing_requirements.reason: The CSS defines section-padding as 7rem (112px) on mobile, which is slightly below the specified 120px minimum.

missing_requirements.requirement: Logo lockup uses the full wordmark generated asset (quindore-logo-lockup.dim_480x80.png)
missing_requirements.reason: The header uses only the monogram image (quindore-monogram.dim_120x120.png) combined with text spans, not the full wordmark lockup asset (quindore-logo-lockup.dim_480x80.png) as specified in the build request.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication infrastructure including useActor, useInternetIdentity hooks, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies a purely static/informational site with no user authentication or accounts. The diff includes a full Internet Identity auth client, actor management hooks, and QueryClientProvider wrapping the app, none of which were requested.
The build request specifies no backend data persistence and a purely static/informational site. An empty Motoko actor file was added which was not requested.
